content: MQP-1 Channel foot Galvanized channel foot for fastening channels to concrete in light/medium-duty applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Flexibility – complete many different applications using few parts Compatible with MQN-C push button channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: DD11 MOD - HN 547, S235JR - DIN EN 10025 Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | DD11 MOD - HN 547, S235JR - DIN EN 10025 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Material thickness | 4 mm | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Weight | 0.26 lb ### ITEMS- 369646 - Base connector light duty MQP-1/1 - Package Size 20 pc
